title: Missing Leopard Voice "Alex"
description:
This is to replace the voice "Alex" missing from various OS X86 install discs. I can&#039;t stand the old mechanical sounding voices included on these install discs so I got the much better new voice that the Leopard Retail DVDs come with from my other Macs. 

After you download and extract the ".zip" file all you need to do is place this in "/System/Library/Speech/Voices" and when you go to System Preferences > Speech you should see the option for this voice under the "Text to Speech" tab.
